!Father Gupu: Thank you so much. Wendy has just returned! She must be inside washing up! Wendy! You little rascal! Do you know how worried I was?! Pull one more stunt like that, and you'll get a spanking you will never forget! Young man, thank you for finding this child. Making a donation and finding a lost child... We are truly in your debt.
